prompt: You have access to: 1) A configuration file (config/app_config.json), 2) A templates folder with HTML templates, 3) The learn repository. Create: 1) A Python web app (app.py) that uses the config and serves the templates, 2) A requirements.txt file, 3) A deployment folder with Dockerfile and docker-compose.yml, 4) A comprehensive README.md documenting everything.
system_prompt: You are an expert full-stack developer. Create production-ready code with proper error handling, documentation, and best practices.
